name: Linux / Operating Systems
description: Learn Linux and Operating System fundamentals: shell, files, processes, and system navigation.

tutorials.title: 1. Introduction to Linux and OS Concepts
tutorials.description: Overview of operating systems, the role of the kernel, and the Linux ecosystem. Learn what makes Linux different from Windows and macOS.

tutorials.title: 2. Installing Linux
tutorials.description: Learn how to install Linux (Ubuntu, Fedora, Arch). Covers dual-boot, virtual machines, and WSL on Windows.

tutorials.title: 3. Linux File System Basics
tutorials.description: Understand the Linux directory structure: /home, /etc, /bin, /usr. Learn absolute vs relative paths.

tutorials.title: 4. Introduction to the Shell
tutorials.description: Learn what the shell is, how it works, and how to open a terminal. Run simple commands and explore your system.

tutorials.title: 5. Basic Commands
tutorials.description: Get familiar with ls, cd, pwd, mkdir, rm, cp, and mv. Learn how to navigate and manipulate files/directories.
